card.name: The One Ring
card.property: While wearing The One Ring, the Ring-bearer gains hunter 3, and each time he or she is about to take a wound in a skirmish, add a burden instead. Skirmish: Add a burden to wear The One Ring until the regroup phase.

card.name: The One Ring
card.property: Response: If bearer is about to take a wound in a skirmish, he wears The One Ring until the regroup phase. While wearing The One Ring, each time the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound during a skirmish, add a burden instead.

card.name: Chamber of Records
card.property: When you play this, you may spot a Dwarf to place 2 [Dwarven] tokens here. Fellowship: Discard this from play or remove a [Dwarven] token from here to reveal the top card of your draw deck. If it is a [Dwarven] card, take it into your hand, otherwise, place it in your discard pile.

card.name: The Fortunes of Balin
card.property: Exert a Dwarf to shuffle a [Dwarven] condition with one or more [Dwarven] tokens on it into your draw deck. Wound a minion for each [Dwarven] token that was on that condition.

card.name: Gimli
card.property: Damage +1. Hunter 3. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +3.)

card.name: Gloin
card.property: Each time Gloin wins a skirmish, you may draw 3 cards, then place 3 cards from your hand beneath your draw deck in any order. Skirmish: Remove a [Dwarven] token to make Gloin strength +2.

card.name: Heavy Axe
card.property: Bearer must be a Dwarf. This is twilight cost -1 for each [Dwarven] card that has a culture token on it. Skirmish: Remove a [Dwarven] token to make bearer strength +1.

card.name: Sturdy Stock
card.property: Make a Dwarf strength +2 (or if you can spot a hunter minion, strength +1 and damage +1 for each hunter minion you can spot).

card.name: Well-crafted Armor
card.property: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Each time bearer takes a wound, you may reinforce a [Dwarven] token. Skirmish: Discard a [Dwarven] card from hand to make bearer damage +1.

card.name: Whatever End
card.property: Each time Gimli wins a skirmish, you may make a hunter [Gondor] companion or hunter [Elven] companion damage +1 until the regroup phase. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a [Dwarven] companion strength +2.

card.name: Arwen
card.property: While you can spot Aragorn, Arwen is strength +1 and resistance +2. Skirmish: Remove an [Elven] token to make a minion skirmishing Arwen strength -2.

card.name: Dinendal
card.property: Aid - (3). (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add (3) to transfer this to a companion.) Each time you transfer this to a companion, except an [Elven]companion, exert bearer. Bearer is an archer.

card.name: Elven Bow
card.property: Bearer must be an Elf. Bearer is an archer.

card.name: Elven Warrior
card.property: While this companion is bearing a possession, he is strength +2. Maneuver: Exert this companion to place an [Elven] card from your discard pile on the bottom of your draw deck.

card.name: Focus
card.property: Each time Legolas wins a skirmish, you may heal a hunter [Dwarven] Dwarf or hunter [Gondor] Man. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make an [Elven] Elf strength +2.

card.name: Gift of the Evenstar
card.property: Each time an Elf wins a skirmish, you may exert that Elf or Aragorn to place an [Elven] token here. At the start of each maneuver phase, you may remove an [Elven] token here to draw a card.

card.name: Haldir
card.property: To play, spot an Elf. While the fellowship is at a battleground site, Haldir is strength +2. While the fellowship is at a forest site, Haldir is an archer.

card.name: Legolas
card.property: Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Regroup: Exert 2 hunter companions to draw a card.

card.name: Legolas
card.property: Archer. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Archery: Exert Legolas to make the fellowship archery total +1 for each hunter minion you can spot. (limit +3)

card.name: Lorien
card.property: Spot an [Elven] follower to make the minion archery total -3.

card.name: Mighty Shot
card.property: Spot an Elf to make the fellowship archery total +1 for each minion with twilight cost 2 or less that you can spot.

card.name: The Mirror of Galadriel
card.property: To play, spot 3 Elves. Each time you are about to draw a card, you may exert an Elf to look at the top three cards of your draw deck instead. Take a Free Peoples card into your hand and place the other cards on the bottom of your draw deck.

card.name: Point Blank Range
card.property: Make an Elf strength +2 (or +4 if you can spot 3 archers).

card.name: Spied From Afar
card.property: To play, spot 3 Elves. While you can spot an [Elven] follower, the twilight cost of each Shadow possession is +1. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make an [Elven] companion strength +1 for each archer companion you can spot.

card.name: Sword of the Fallen
card.property: Bearer must be an Elf. Each minion skirmishing bearer is strength -1 for each wound on that minion. Skirmish: Exert bearer to exert a minion skirmishing bearer.

card.name: Uruviel
card.property: Aid - (1). (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add(1) to transfer this to a companion.) Each time you transfer this to a companion, you may exert an Elf to make the fellowship's current site a forest until the end of the turn.

card.name: Be Gone
card.property: Spell. Exert your [Gandalf] companion X times to make a minion strength -2 until the regroup phase, for each time that [Gandalf] companion exerted.

card.name: Ent Avenger
card.property: While you can spot 3 Ents, this companion is strength +2.

card.name: Gandalf
card.property: To play, spot 2 Hobbits. Each time you play a spell, you may add a burden to wound a minion. At the start of each skirmish involving Gandalf, you may draw a card and then discard a card from your hand.

card.name: Gandalf
card.property: To play, spot 2 Hobbits. Each time you play a spell, you may add a burden to wound a minion. At the start of each skirmish involving Gandalf, you may draw a card and then discard a card from your hand.

card.name: Leaflock
card.property: Leaflock's twilight cost is -1 for each Ent you can spot. While you can spot 4 other Ents, Leaflock is strength +4.

card.name: Mellon
card.property: To play, spot 2 [Gandalf] companions. At the start of the maneuver phase, discard this conditiondiscard each of them and draw the same number of cards from the top of his or her draw deck.

card.name: Momentous Gathering
card.property: Choose one: spot an Ent to take a [Gandalf] companion into hand from your draw deck; or spot 2 Ents to take a [Gandalf] companion and a [Gandalf] condition into hand from your draw deck. Shuffle your draw deck.

card.name: One Last Surprise
card.property: Spell. Spot Gandalf and an unbound companion skirmishing a minion to use Gandalf's resistance to resolve that skirmish instead of that companion's strength.

card.name: Quickbeam
card.property: Quickbeam is twilight cost -1 for each Ent you can spot. Maneuver: Discard this companion to place another [Gandalf] companion from your discard pile on the bottom of your draw deck and reinforce a [Gandalf] token.

card.name: Shadow of the Wood
card.property: This companion is twilight cost -1 for each [Gandalf] companion you can spot. Fellowship: Place this companion in the dead pile to remove (5).

card.name: Shepherd of the Trees
card.property: While you can spot 4 Ents, this companion is strength +3. Maneuver: Exert this companion to reveal the bottom card of your draw deck. If it is a [Gandalf] character, you may play it.

card.name: Skinbark
card.property: Skinbark is twilight cost -1 for each [Gandalf] condition you can spot. Each time Skinbark wins a skirmish, you may place a [Gandalf] card from your discard pile beneath your draw deck.

card.name: Treebeard
card.property: To play, spot 3 [Gandalf] companions. Each time Treebeard wins a skirmish, the first Shadow player must exert X minions, where X is the difference between Treebeard's strength and the losing character's strength.

card.name: Called to Mordor
card.property: Bearer must be Smeagol. While you can spot 2 Ring-bound Hobbits, each time an opponent uses a skirmish special ability in a skirmish involving Gollum or Smeagol, you may wound a minion.

card.name: Connected by Fate
card.property: To play, spot Smeagol. While you can spot 2 Ring-bound Hobbits, each Shadow event is twilight cost +1. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make each Ring-bound companion strength +1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Controlled by the Ring
card.property: Bearer must be Gollum. Skirmish: If Gollum is not assigned to a skirmish, discard this condition to have him replace a minion skirmishing a companion.

card.name: Desperate Move
card.property: Discard a [Gollum] minion from play to discard a companion. The Free Peoples player may make the move limit -1 this turn to prevent that.

card.name: Gollum
card.property: At the start of each skirmish involving Gollum, he is strength +X until the end of that skirmish, where X is the Ring-bearer's strength.

card.name: Herbs and Stewed Rabbit
card.property: While you can spot Frodo, Smeagol is resistance +1. While you can spot Sam, Smeagol is strength +1. While you can spot Bilbo, Smeagol is damage +1.

card.name: Hurry Hobbitses
card.property: Make Smeagol strength +1 for each Ring-bound Hobbit you can spot.

card.name: Nice Fish
card.property: Each time Smeagol wins a skirmish, place a [Gollum] token here. Regroup: Heal a Ring-bound companion for each token here. Discard this condition.

card.name: Not This Time
card.property: Skirmish: Exert Gollum and remove a threat to wound a companion Gollum is skirmishing.

card.name: Release Them
card.property: Spot Smeagol to prevent a Ring-bound Hobbit from being overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled. While this card is in your discard pile, Smeagol is resistance +1.

card.name: Smeagol
card.property: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Each Ring-bound companion is resistance +1. Skirmish: Exert 2 Ring-bound Hobbits to make Smeagol strength +1 and prevent him from being overwhelmed unless his strength is tripled.

card.name: Something Slimy
card.property: Spot Smeagol to play a Free Peoples condition from your draw deck. If that condition was a [Gollum] condition, you may make an opponent place a random card from his or her hand beneath his or her draw deck. Shuffle your draw deck.

card.name: Sudden Strike
card.property: Spot Gollum or Smeagol to play a miniondraw deck. If that minion is a [Gollum] minion, you may also play a Shadow possession or Shadow condition from your draw deck. Shuffle your draw deck.

card.name: Swear By the Precious
card.property: Spot Frodo and Smeagol to discard a minion. That minion's owner may make each minion strength -2 until the end of the turn to prevent that.

card.name: Unseen Foe
card.property: Discard a [Gollum] minion from play to wound each companion with strength 8 or more.

card.name: Aragorn
card.property: Ranger. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Skirmish: Exert Aragorn to make a hunter companion strength +1.

card.name: Aragorn
card.property: Ranger. Hunter 2. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +2.) Maneuver: Add a threat to exert a non-hunter minion with strength less than Aragorn's.

card.name: Aragorn
card.property: Bearer must be Aragorn. He is an archer. Archery: Add a threat to wound a minionstrength.

card.name: Damrod
card.property: Ranger. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) At the start of each fellowship phase, you may add (1) to heal a ranger.

card.name: Decorated Barricade
card.property: Fortification. This condition is twilight cost -1 for each [Gondor] ranger you spot. Skirmish: Exert 2 [Gondor] Men to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion skirmishing a [Gondor] Man.

card.name: Dunedain of the South
card.property: Ranger. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Each time this companion wins a skirmish, you may make a [Gondor] ranger strength +2 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Forth the Three Hunters
card.property: Archery: Exert Legolas and exert Aragorn to wound a minion. Skirmish: Exert Aragorn and spot Gimli to make a minion strength -1 (or -3 if Aragorn and Gimli are The hunters). Regroup: Exert Gimli and spot Legolas to draw a card (or 2 cards if Gimli and Legolas are The hunters).

card.name: Forth the Three Hunters
card.property: Archery: Exert Legolas and exert Aragorn to wound a minion. Skirmish: Exert Aragorn and spot Gimli to make a minion strength -1 (or -3 if Aragorn and Gimli are The hunters). Regroup: Exert Gimli and spot Legolas to draw a card (or 2 cards if Gimli and Legolas are The hunters).

card.name: Forth the Three Hunters
card.property: Archery: Exert Legolas and exert Aragorn to wound a minion. Skirmish: Exert Aragorn and spot Gimli to make a minion strength -1 (or -3 if Aragorn and Gimli are The hunters). Regroup: Exert Gimli and spot Legolas to draw a card (or 2 cards if Gimli and Legolas are The hunters).

card.name: Gondorian Prowler
card.property: Ranger. Hunter 1. When this companion is in your starting fellowship, his twilight cost is -1. Skirmish: Remove a [Gondor] token or exert a [Gondor] Man to make the site number of a minion +2.

card.name: Ithilien Blade
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gondor] Man. While you can spot a roaming minion, bearer is strength +1. Maneuver: Exert bearer twice to discard a roaming minion.

card.name: Mablung
card.property: Ranger. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Skirmish: Exert Mablung to wound a roaming minion he is skirmishing.

card.name: Madril
card.property: Ranger. Hunter 1. While you can spot 2 [Gondor] rangers, Madril is twilight cost -2. At the start of the maneuver phase, each minion is site number +1 for each threat you can spot until the start of the regroup phase.

card.name: No Quicker Path
card.property: Each time Aragorn wins a skirmish, you may make a hunter [Dwarven] companion or hunter [Elven] companion strength +1 until the regroup phase. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a [Gondor] Man strength +2.

card.name: No Travellers In This Land
card.property: Exert a [Gondor] Man to wound a minion (or wound that minion twice if it is a hunter).

card.name: Portico
card.property: Fortification. This condition is twilight cost -1 for each [Gondor] ranger you spot. Skirmish: Exert a [Gondor] Man or spot 2 rangers to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion skirmishing a [Gondor] Man.

card.name: Ranger
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gondor] Man. While bearer is a ranger or at a forest site, each minion skirmishing bearer is site number +2. Skirmish: Add a threat or exert bearer to make a minion skirmishing a [Gondor] Man site number +2.

card.name: Silent Traveler
card.property: Ranger. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) At the start of each skirmish involving this companion and a roaming minion, you may reinforce a [Gondor] token.

card.name: Tremendous Wall
card.property: Fortification. Characters skirmishing bearer cannot take wounds from losing a skirmish involving bearer. Skirmish: Exert a [Gondor] Man or spot 3 rangers to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion skirmishing a [Gondor] Man.

card.name: Unyielding Ranger
card.property: Ranger. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) This companion is strength +1 for each roaming minion you can spot.

card.name: Bill Ferny
card.property: If Bill Ferny is unwounded, the Free Peoples player cannot assign him to skirmish a companion. Shadow: Exert Bill Ferny twice and spot a site you control to add (2).

card.name: Bold Easterling
card.property: Skirmish: If this minion is skirmishing, discard this minion to play a [Men] minion from your discard pile. That minion is fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Chieftain of Dunland
card.property: Fierce. Skirmish: Spot a site you control and remove (2) to make a [Men] Man strength +2. Skirmish: Spot 2 sites you control and remove (2) to make a [Men] Man strength +3. Skirmish: Spot 3 sites you control and remove (2) to make a [Men] Man strength +4.

card.name: Courageous Easterling
card.property: Skirmish: If this minion is skirmishing, discard this minion to play a [Men] minion from your discard pile. That minion is fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Destroyed Homestead
card.property: When you play this, spot 2 [Men] Men to randomly reveal a site from the Free Peoples player's adventure deck. Note its cardtitle. Each site on the adventure path with the same card title as the selected site loses its gametext.

card.name: Easterling Scout
card.property: Skirmish: If this minion is skirmishing, discard this minion to play a [Men] minion from your discard pile. That minion is fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Engrossed Hillman
card.property: At the start of the maneuver phase, if you can spot another [Men] Man and 8 characters (or if you can spot 3 Free Peoples cultures), you may take control of a site.

card.name: Enraged Herdsman
card.property: While you can spot more companions than minions, each [Men] hunter is strength +2 and is an archer.

card.name: Great Axe
card.property: Bearer must be a [Men] Man. While bearer is skirmishing a hunter companion, bearer is strength +2.

card.name: Grieving the Fallen
card.property: To play, spot a [Men] Man. Bearer must be a companion (except the Ring-bearer). Bearer cannot take wounds during the archery phase. At the start of the regroup phase, discard this condition.

card.name: Grousing Hillman
card.property: While you control a site, this minion is strength +3 and fierce.

card.name: Hunting Herdsman
card.property: Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) This minion is strength +3 for each follower you can spot.

card.name: Last Gasp
card.property: Wound 3 [Men] archers to exhaust a companion.

card.name: Lying Counsel
card.property: Exert your [Men] Man and spot an unbound companion bearing 3 or more cards to return each Free Peoples card that companion bears to its owner's hand. The Free Peoples player may add a burden to discard those cards instead.

card.name: Mumak Commander
card.property: Maneuver: Exert Mumak Commander twice to exert a companion twice (except the Ring-bearer).

card.name: Primitive Savage
card.property: While you can spot a companion of strength 12 or more, this minion is strength +5. Each time this minion wins a skirmish, if he bears a hand weapon, you may take control of a site.

card.name: Pursuing Horde
card.property: To play, spot a [Men] Man. Bearer must be a companion (except the Ring-bearer). Limit 1 per companion. Each time the fellowship moves, add (1).

card.name: Rapid Reload
card.property: While you can spot a [Men] Man, the Free Peoples player cannot replace a site in the current region. Archery: Spot a [Men] Man and remove (3) to exert an unbound companion.

card.name: Rapt Hillman
card.property: At the start of the regroup phase, the Free People's player may liberate a site. You may spot 3 Men to prevent this. Maneuver: Spot another [Men] Man and exert this minion to take control of a site.

card.name: Ravaging Wild Man
card.property: While you can spot a hunter, this minion gains hunter 1. Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may exert 2 [Men] Men to discard a follower.

card.name: Savage Southron
card.property: Maneuver: If the Free People's player has at least 1 site in his or her adventure deck, exert 2 [Men] Men to randomly choose a site from that deck. Replace the fellowship's current site with that site.

card.name: Swarthy Hillman
card.property: While you control a site, this minion is an archer.

card.name: Wandering Hillman
card.property: To play, spot a [Men] Man. While you can spot a companion of strength 10 or more, this minion is strength +3. Maneuver: Remove 2 burdens or 2 threats to control a site.

card.name: Battlefield Recruit
card.property: Skirmish: Discard this minion to make a minion strength +2.

card.name: Battlefield Veteran
card.property: Skirmish: Discard this minion to make a minion strength +1.

card.name: Beasts of Burden
card.property: To play, spot 2 [Orc] minions. At the start of your Shadow phase, you may discard an [Orc] condition from play to play an [Orc] minion. It is twilight cost -2 (or -4 if you can spot 6 or more companions).

card.name: Black Gate Sentry
card.property: Skirmish: Exert this minion to wound a companion it is skirmishing.

card.name: Black Land Chieftain
card.property: To play, spot an [Orc] minion. When you play Black Land Chieftain, you may add a threat for each Free Peoples possession and each Free Peoples artifact you can spot.

card.name: Black Land Commander
card.property: While you can spot a companion of strength 12 or more, this minion is strength +5. Skirmish: Remove 2 threats to make a character skirmishing this minion strength -2.

card.name: Black Land Observer
card.property: When you play this minion, you may spot an [Orc] condition to add a threat. While you can spot a companion of strength 10 or more, this minion is strength +3.

card.name: Black Land Overlord
card.property: Maneuver: Remove a threat and spot another [Orc] minion to exert an unbound companion.

card.name: Black Land Runner
card.property: To play, spot an [Orc] Orc. While you can spot more sites on the adventure path than minions, this minion is strength +5.

card.name: Black Land Shrieker
card.property: To play, spot an [Orc] condition. Black Land Shrieker is twilight cost -1 for each threat you spot.

card.name: Black Land Spy
card.property: When you play this minion, you may spot an [Orc] possession to add a threat. While you can spot a companion of strength 13 or more, this minion is strength +7.

card.name: Coordinated Effort
card.property: To play, spot 2 [Orc] minions. Each time the Free Peoples player plays a possession, add (2).

card.name: Desolation Orc
card.property: To play, spot 3 Free Peoples cultures or discard 2 [Orc] conditions from play.

card.name: Destructive Orc
card.property: When you play Destructive Orc, you may discard a fortification for each [Orc] possession and each [Orc] artifact you can spot.

card.name: Gorbag
card.property: Hunter 3. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +3.) When you play Gorbag, you may discard a card from the top of the Free Peoples player's deck for each hunter character you can spot.

card.name: Isengard Marauder
card.property: To play, discard 3 cards from your hand. While you can spot 2 other [Orc] minions, this minion is fierce.

card.name: Moria Menace
card.property: Skirmish: Exert this minion to make the Free Peoples player shuffle his or her draw deck and reveal the top card of that draw deck. Make this minion strength +X, where X is the twilight cost of the revealed card.

card.name: Mountain-troll
card.property: When you play this minion, you may discard 5 [Orc] minions from play to make it twilight cost -10 and fierce. Shadow: Remove (3) to play an [Orc] Orc from your discard pile. Its twilight cost is -2.

card.name: Orkish Camp
card.property: While you can spot a [Orc] Orc, the Free Peoples player cannot replace the fellowship's current site. Shadow: Exert an [Orc] minion and remove (2) to reveal the bottom card of your draw deck. If it is an [Orc] Orc, take it into hand. Otherwise, discard it.

card.name: Orkish Hunting Spear
card.property: Bearer must be an [Orc] Orc. Bearer gains hunter X (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +X.), where X is the number of Free Peoples cultures you can spot.

card.name: Pummeling Blow
card.property: To play, exert an [Orc] minion. Plays on the fellowship's current site. This site cannot be replaced. While the fellowship is at this site, each Troll is strength +1.

card.name: Scouting Orc
card.property: Skirmish: Exert this minion to wound a companion it is skirmishing.

card.name: Tower Troll
card.property: For each companion over 5, this minion is damage +1. Assignment: Exert this minion twice to assign it to a companion (except the Ring-bearer). If you cannot spot 6 companions, the Free Peoples player may exert a companion to prevent this.

card.name: Unmistakable Omen
card.property: While you can spot a threat, the site number of each [Orc] Orc is -1. Regroup: Remove 3 threats and discard 3 [Orc] Orcs from play to make the Free Peoples player spot a companion and place that companion in the dead pile. Discard this condition.

card.name: Unreasonable Choice
card.property: Spot 2 [Orc] minions to discard a Free Peoples condition. The Free Peoples player may add (2) for each Free Peoples condition you can spot to prevent that.

card.name: Veteran War Chief
card.property: Skirmish: Exert this minion to wound a companion it is skirmishing.

card.name: Brilliant Light
card.property: Make a [Rohan] companion strength +2 (or +3 and damage +1 if he or she is a hunter companion).

card.name: Burial Mounds
card.property: Make a [Rohan] companion defender +1 and minions skirmishing that companion cannot take wounds during a skirmish involving that companion until the regroup phase.

card.name: Eomer
card.property: Valiant. Hunter 2. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +2.) While you can spot a [Rohan] Man, Eomer's twilight cost is -1. Skirmish: Discard a [Rohan] card from hand to make Eomer strength +2.

card.name: Eomer
card.property: Bearer must be a [Rohan] Man. If bearer is Eomer and he is unwounded, he is damage +1 and resistance +1. Skirmish: If bearer is Eomer, discard this possession to wound a minion he is skirmishing.

card.name: Eowyn
card.property: Valiant. Response: If a hunter companion or valiant Man is about to take a wound, exert Eowyn to prevent that wound.

card.name: Gamling
card.property: Valiant. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) To play, spot a [Rohan] Man. While you can spot 3 The hunters, Gamling is strength +3.

card.name: Grim Trophy
card.property: Make a [Rohan] Man strength +1 for each hunter you can spot (or if you can spot more valiant Men than The hunters, make a [Rohan] Man strength +1 for each valiant Man you can spot).

card.name: Haleth
card.property: While you can spot 2 mounts, Haleth is strength +2. While you can spot 3 mounts, Haleth is damage +1. While you can spot 4 Free Peoples mounts, those mounts can not be discarded by a Shadow player.

card.name: Horse of Great Stature
card.property: Bearer must be a [Rohan] Man. At the start of each skirmishminion skirmishing bearer must exert. Skirmish: Exert bearer to make a [Rohan] Man strength +1.

card.name: Horseman of the North
card.property: While you can spot a valiant Man, this companion's twilight cost is -1. While no opponent controls a site, this companion is strength +2.

card.name: Our Inspiration
card.property: Spot a [Rohan] Man to play a possession from your discard pile for each hunter character you can spot.

card.name: Last Days of My House
card.property: Spot 2 [Rohan] Men (or 1 hunter [Rohan][Rohan] companion or a [Rohan]followerdraw deck.

card.name: Rider
card.property: Bearer must be a [Rohan] Man. At the start of each skirmish involving bearer, each minion skirmishing bearer must exert.

card.name: Rohan Stable Master
card.property: Aid - (1). (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add (1) to transfer this to a companion.) To play, spot a [Rohan] Man. Bearer is considered to be mounted.

card.name: Rohan Worker
card.property: Aid - (1). Each time you transfer this to a companion, except a [Rohan] companion, exert bearer twice. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may liberate a site.

card.name: Rohirrim Axe
card.property: Bearer must be a [Rohan] Man. While bearer is skirmishing a hunter minion, bearer is damage +1.

card.name: Rohirrim Doorwarden
card.property: Aid - (2). (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add (2) to transfer this to a companion.) To play, spot a [Rohan] Man. Bearer is strength +1 for each possession he or she bears.

card.name: Rohirrim Soldier
card.property: Valiant. While you can spot a [Rohan] Man, this companion's twilight cost is -1. This companion is strength +1 for each hunter minion you can spot.

card.name: Rohirrim Warrior
card.property: Valiant. At the start of the maneuver phase, you may spot a hunter minion (or exert 2 valiant Men) to make this companion defender +1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Spear of the Mark
card.property: Bearer must be a [Rohan] Man. If bearer is mounted, bearer is defender +1.

card.name: Sturdy Shield
card.property: Bearer must be a [Rohan] Man. While no opponent controls a site, bearer is strength +1. Regroup: Discard this to liberate a site (or two sites if bearer is mounted).

card.name: Swift Stroke
card.property: Spot your [Rohan] Man bearing a possession to discard all possessions from one character.

card.name: Community Living
card.property: Spot a Hobbit to play a [Shire] follower from your draw deck.

card.name: Frodo
card.property: Ring-bearer. Ring-bound. While skirmishing a minion of strength 8 or less, Frodo is strength +2.

card.name: Hobbit Sword
card.property: Bearer must be a Hobbit.

card.name: Hobbiton Brewer
card.property: Aid - Add 2 burdens. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add 2 burdens to transfer this to a companion.) To play, spot a Hobbit. Response: If bearer is about to take a wound, transfer Hobbiton Brewer to your support area to prevent that wound.

card.name: Hobbiton Farmer
card.property: Aid - Add a burden. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add a burden to transfer this to a companion.) To play, spot 2 Hobbits. Bearer is strength +1 for each fierce minion you can spot.

card.name: Little Golden Flower
card.property: Each Hobbit bearing a hand weapon is vitality +1. Each Hobbit bearing a follower is resistance +1. Each unwounded Hobbit is strength +1.

card.name: Merry
card.property: While Merry bears a follower, he is strength +2. Skirmish: If Merry is skirmishing a hunter minion, add a threat to make Merry strength +2.

card.name: No Visitors
card.property: Transfer a follower from a Hobbit to your support area to cancel a skirmish involving that Hobbit.

card.name: Pippin
card.property: Each [Shire] follower is twilight cost -1. Skirmish:minion, exert the Ring-bearer to make Pippin strength +2.

card.name: Relaxation
card.property: Response: If a Shadow card is about to add any number of burdens, discard a [Shire] follower and this condition from play to prevent that and discard that Shadow card.

card.name: Sam
card.property: Ring-bound. While Sam bears the One Ring, he is resistance -4. Maneuver: If Sam is bearing a follower, exert him to heal another Hobbit. Response: If Frodo is killed, make Sam the Ring-bearer.

card.name: Second Breakfast
card.property: Add a threat and exert your Ring-bearer to wound each non-hunter minion skirmishing your [Shire] Ring-bearer.

card.name: Advancing Horde
card.property: Damage +1. This minion is strength +1 for each site you control.

card.name: Charging Uruk
card.property: Fierce. During a fierce skirmish involving this minion, it is strength +3 and gains hunter 1 (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.)

card.name: Chasing Uruk
card.property: Fierce. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may spot 4 The hunters (or Ugluk) to control a site.

card.name: Covetous Uruk
card.property: Damage +1. This minion is strength +1 for each possession you spot.

card.name: Defensive Rush
card.property: While you can spot an [Uruk-hai] minion, the Free Peoples player cannot replace a site. At the start of each skirmish, you may remove (3) to heal an [Uruk-hai] minion (or heal an [Uruk-hai] minion twice if you control a site.)

card.name: Following Uruk
card.property: Fierce. Hunter 1. Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may exert a companion not assigned to a skirmish.

card.name: Hunting Uruk
card.property: While this minion is at a battleground site, he gains hunter 1 (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.)

card.name: Lurtz
card.property: Damage +1. Each time Lurtz wins a skirmish, the Free People's player must exert X companions, where X is the current region number.

card.name: Lurtz
card.property: Bearer must be an [Uruk-hai] Uruk-hai. Bearer gains hunter 1 (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) If bearer is Lurtz, he is fierce.

card.name: Mauhur
card.property: Fierce. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.). Assignment: Exert Mauhur to assign him to a non-hunter character (except the Ring-bearer).

card.name: Merciless Berserker
card.property: Damage +1. Shadow: Exert this minion to exert X companions and add X threats, where X is the number of Free Peoples cultures you spot over 2.

card.name: Poised for Assault
card.property: Each time a companion loses a skirmish involving an [Uruk-hai] minion, place an [Uruk-hai] token here. Skirmish: Remove 2 [Uruk-hai] tokens from here to take control of a site.

card.name: Pursuing Uruk
card.property: Fierce. During a fierce skirmish involving this minion, it gains hunter 4.

card.name: Searching Uruk
card.property: Fierce. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Searching Uruk is strength +1 for each other [Uruk-hai] hunter you can spot.

card.name: Seeking Uruk
card.property: Fierce. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) During a fierce skirmish involving this minion, it is strength +1 for each hunter you can spot.

card.name: Sentry Uruk
card.property: To play, spot an [Uruk-hai] minion. While you can spot a fierce minion, this minion is fierce. While you can spot a hunter, this minion gains hunter 1. While you can spot a character that is damage +1, this minion is damage +1.

card.name: Tracking Uruk
card.property: Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.)

card.name: Ugluk
card.property: Fierce. Hunter 3. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +3.) At the start of each skirmish involving Ugluk, each non-hunter skirmishing Ugluk must exert.

card.name: Ugluk
card.property: Bearer must be an [Uruk-hai] Uruk-hai. While you control 2 or more sites, bearer can not take wounds (except during skirmish phases). If bearer is Ugluk, he is damage +1.

card.name: Uruk Cavern Striker
card.property: Damage +1. Skirmish: Spot a Free Peoples player's site on the adventure path and exert this minion twice to exchange the spotted site with a site you control. You now control the spotted site.

card.name: Uruk Infantry
card.property: Damage +1. While you can spot a companion of strength 10 or more, this minion is strength +2. Regroup: Exert 4 [Uruk-hai] minions (or discard 3 [Uruk-hai] minions) to take control of a site.

card.name: Uruk Village Assassin
card.property: Damage +1. At the start of the maneuver phase, you may spot another [Uruk-hai] minion and remove 3 [Uruk-hai] tokens to take control of a site or discard a follower.

card.name: Uruk Village Rager
card.property: Damage +1. Each time this minion wins a skirmish, take control of a site. While you control a site, this minion cannot take wounds (except during the skirmish phase).

card.name: Uruk Village Stormer
card.property: Damage +1. While you can spot a companion of strength 12 or more, this minion is strength +4. Each time a companion or ally is killed during a skirmish involving an [Uruk-hai] minion, you may take control of a site.

card.name: Violent Hurl
card.property: Make an [Uruk-hai] minion strength +2 (and damage +1 if that minion is a hunter).

card.name: With All Possible Speed
card.property: Each unwounded hunter [Uruk-hai] minion is strength +1. Response: If your hunter minion is about to take a wound during a skirmish, discard that minion to exert a non-hunter companion.

card.name: Later Than You Think
card.property: Remove 2 threats to play a Nazgul. That Nazgul is twilight coststrength +2.) until the start of the regroup phase.

card.name: A Shadow Fell Over Them
card.property: Each time a Nazgul wins a skirmish, you may exert 2 Nazgul (or a Nazgul twice) to add a threat. Assignment: Spot a Nazgul and remove (4) to play a Nazgul from your discard pile.

card.name: They Feel the Precious
card.property: Response: If a Nazgul is about to take a wound, remove a threat to prevent that wound.

card.name: Ulaire Attea
card.property: Fierce. Ulaire Attea is strength +1 for every 3 twilight tokens you can spot.

card.name: Ulaire Lemenya
card.property: Fierce. When you play Ulaire Lemenya, you may remove (1) to add a threat for each Free Peoples culture you can spot.

card.name: Ulaire Nelya
card.property: Fierce. While you can spot 6 companions, [Wraith] minions cannot take wounds (except during skirmish phases). Skirmish: If this minion is mounted, exert him twice to wound a companion bearing a [Wraith] condition.

card.name: Anduin River
card.property: River. The fellowship archery total is -3.

card.name: Breeding Pit of Isengard
card.property: Underground. The twilight cost of the first hunter minion played each shadow phase is -2.

card.name: City Gates
card.property: When the Fellowship moves to this site, add a threat (or 2 if you can spot a hunter minion) for each companion over 4.

card.name: East Wall of Rohan
card.property: At the start of the Fellowship phase, you may exert two hunter companions to play a hunter companion from your draw deck.

card.name: Gate of Mordor
card.property: Battleground. Each time the fellowship moves to this site add (1) for each culture you can spot.

card.name: Isengard Ruined
card.property: Battleground. Each time a follower is transferred to a character, the first Shadow player may exert a companion twice.

card.name: Mount Doom
card.property: Battleground. Mountain. Underground. Until the end of the game, sites in this region cannot be replaced.

card.name: Westfold Village
card.property: Plains. Each hunter character is strength +1.

card.name: The One Ring
card.property: While wearing The One Ring, the Ring-bearer gains hunter 3, and each time he or she is about to take a wound in a skirmish, add a burden instead. Skirmish: Add a burden to wear The One Ring until the regroup phase.

card.name: Well-crafted Armor
card.property: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Each time bearer takes a wound, you may reinforce a [Dwarven] token. Skirmish: Discard a [Dwarven] card from hand to make bearer damage +1.

card.name: Legolas
card.property: Archer. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Archery: Exert Legolas to make the fellowship archery total +1 for each hunter minion you can spot. (limit +3)

card.name: The Mirror of Galadriel
card.property: To play, spot 3 Elves. Each time you are about to draw a card, you may exert an Elf to look at the top three cards of your draw deck instead. Take a Free Peoples card into your hand and place the other cards on the bottom of your draw deck.

card.name: Gandalf
card.property: To play, spot 2 Hobbits. Each time you play a spell, you may add a burden to wound a minion. At the start of each skirmish involving Gandalf, you may draw a card and then discard a card from your hand.

card.name: One Last Surprise
card.property: Spell. Spot Gandalf and an unbound companion skirmishing a minion to use Gandalf's resistance to resolve that skirmish instead of that companion's strength.

card.name: Quickbeam
card.property: Quickbeam is twilight cost -1 for each Ent you can spot. Maneuver: Discard this companion to place another [Gandalf] companion from your discard pile on the bottom of your draw deck and reinforce a [Gandalf] token.

card.name: Smeagol
card.property: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Each Ring-bound companion is resistance +1. Skirmish: Exert 2 Ring-bound Hobbits to make Smeagol strength +1 and prevent him from being overwhelmed unless his strength is tripled.

card.name: Aragorn
card.property: Ranger. Hunter 2. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +2.) Maneuver: Add a threat to exert a non-hunter minion with strength less than Aragorn's.

card.name: Madril
card.property: Ranger. Hunter 1. While you can spot 2 [Gondor] rangers, Madril is twilight cost -2. At the start of the maneuver phase, each minion is site number +1 for each threat you can spot until the start of the regroup phase.

card.name: Black Land Chieftain
card.property: To play, spot an [Orc] minion. When you play Black Land Chieftain, you may add a threat for each Free Peoples possession and each Free Peoples artifact you can spot.

card.name: Gorbag
card.property: Hunter 3. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +3.) When you play Gorbag, you may discard a card from the top of the Free Peoples player's deck for each hunter character you can spot.

card.name: Eomer
card.property: Valiant. Hunter 2. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +2.) While you can spot a [Rohan] Man, Eomer's twilight cost is -1. Skirmish: Discard a [Rohan] card from hand to make Eomer strength +2.

card.name: Sentry Uruk
card.property: To play, spot an [Uruk-hai] minion. While you can spot a fierce minion, this minion is fierce. While you can spot a hunter, this minion gains hunter 1. While you can spot a character that is damage +1, this minion is damage +1.

card.name: Ulaire Attea
card.property: Fierce. Ulaire Attea is strength +1 for every 3 twilight tokens you can spot.

card.name: Ulaire Lemenya
card.property: Fierce. When you play Ulaire Lemenya, you may remove (1) to add a threat for each Free Peoples culture you can spot.

card.name: Ulaire Nelya
card.property: Fierce. While you can spot 6 companions, [Wraith] minions cannot take wounds (except during skirmish phases). Skirmish: If this minion is mounted, exert him twice to wound a companion bearing a [Wraith] condition.

card.name: Mount Doom
card.property: Battleground. Mountain. Underground. Until the end of the game, sites in this region cannot be replaced.

card.name: Legolas
card.property: Archer. Hunter 1. Archery: Exert Legolas to make the fellowship archery total +1 for each hunter minion you can spot (limit +3).

card.name: Gandalf
card.property: To play, spot 2 Hobbits. Each time you play a spell, you may add a burden to wound a minion. At the start of each skirmish involving Gandalf, you may draw a card, then discard a card from your hand.

card.name: Quickbeam
card.property: Quickbeam is twilight cost -1 for each Ent you can spot. Maneuver: Discard this companion to place another ![Gandalf} companion from your discard pile on the bottom of your draw deck and reinforce a [Gandalf] token.

card.name: Aragorn
card.property: Ranger. Hunter 2. Maneuver: Add a threat to exert a non-hunter minion with strength less than Aragorn.

card.name: Madril
card.property: Ranger. Hunter 1. While you can spot 2 [Gondor] rangers, Madril is twilight cost -2. At the start of the maneuver phase, each minion is site number +1 for each threat you can spot until the start of the regroup phase.

card.name: Eomer
card.property: Valiant. Hunter 2. While you can spot a [Rohan] Man, Eomer's twilight cost is -1. Skirmish: Discard a [Rohan] card from hand to make Eomer strength +2.

card.name: Ulaire Attea
card.property: Fierce. Ulaire Attea is strength +1 for every 3 twilight tokens you can spot.

card.name: Ulaire Lemenya
card.property: Fierce. When you play Ulaire Lemenya, you may remove (1) to add a threat for each Free Peoples culture you can spot.

card.name: Ulaire Nelya
card.property: Fierce. While you can spot 6 companions, [Wraith] minions cannot take wounds (except during skirmish phases). Skirmish: If this minion is mounted, exert him twice to wound a companion bearing a [Wraith] condition.
